summary: An indebted father regrets putting his teenage son in a coma over poor school grades and takes it out on the school system.
cast: Bharat Jadhav|Siddarth Jadhav|Rajdev Jamdade|Girish Joshi|Vidyadhar Joshi|Atul Kale|Vijay Kenkre|Sachin Khedekar|Saksham Kulkarni|Dhananjay Mandrekar|Vaibhav Mangale|Mahesh Manjrekar|Sandeep Pathak|Kishore Pradhan|Rajiv Rane|Kranti Redkar|Kamlakar Satputhe|Rajendra Shisatkar|Gauri Vaidya
title: Shikshanachya Aaicha Gho
